name: Atom Smasher
description:
Now you can live the childhood dream, the universal desire everyone had as a kid: building your own linear accelerators!

If you enjoy geeky construction/puzzle games, I think you'll like it.

It's an engineering game, although the physics involved are not the sort you find in a bridge-building simulation. It's got some odd concepts in it, but I think you can figure it out if you start from the top.

If you decide you do need a tutorial, you can find some videos here:

http://youtu.be/sm-YFPqtsU8

http://youtu.be/d8GKRI87-mk

LATEST RELEASE: Windows 2014-11-8 (Feature complete)

Linux/MAC 2014-11-26

This project is largely finished! Not 100% sure about the Linux/MAC version, let me know whether they work for you or not.
